attributes.action: Walk away from the Brexit talks, do not allow the EU to blackmail us.
attributes.additional_details:
We will not allow our beautiful country to be blackmailed by the EU.
Sign this petition and make sure the voice of the British people is heard. We would rather join the WTO (World trade organization) with no deal from the EU.
attributes.background:
The EU referendum took place on the 23rd of June 2016, and the majority of British people voted for Brexit.
We voted for Brexit to take place for several reasons including immigration (free movement of people), we want our own laws, and we dislike unelected EU leaders ruling our democratic country.
